item.title: Air conditioned bed... Sign me up
item.description:
Air conditioned bed... Sign me up

The Balluga smart bed is so smart, it makes every other bed look like it's just crawled out from the sea. From the active air suspension to data monitoring that means you'll be able to repeat your best night's sleep, it's sole aim is to help you sleep like a baby, night after night.

This Amazing App Could Integrate Every Urban Transportation System—And Pay You Not To Drive | Co.Exist | ideas + impact

item.title: More on Silicon Valley, and the state of comedy today. Fascinating
item.description:
More on Silicon Valley, and the state of comedy today. Fascinating

The games begin-as they so often do-with a poop joke. ¶ It's a late-January morning and we're on a giant back-lot soundstage in Los Angeles, where cast members of HBO's dot-comedy Silicon Valley are hunched over their laptops, tossing out beta-male insults.

item.title: Holy $#!+... Much different than the one I used to drive
item.description:
Holy $#!+... Much different than the one I used to drive

Lincoln's theme of "quiet luxury" continues with a concept that previews a next generation Navigator. The large luxury sport ute has lost a bit of its market to the Cadillac Escalade in recent years, but that may soon change if Lincoln has its way.

item.title: I get more excited every day. Hilarious
item.description:
I get more excited every day. Hilarious

Just as Mike Judge savaged corporate life with his movie Office Space, his TV series Silicon Valley takes no prisoners in lampooning startup culture. Now, as the show gets ready to head into its third season, its stars (Thomas Middleditch, T.J. Miller, Kumail Nanjiani, Martin Starr, and Zach Woods) are also making their first WIRED cover appearances.
